name: Wisdom of the Aetherweaver
description: Increases magic damage dealt by 60%. Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities. Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

name: Wisdom of the Martialist
description: Increases physical damage dealt by 40%. Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities. Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

name: Wisdom of the Platebearer
description: Increases defense by 3,000 and maximum HP by 50%. Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities. Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.
jobs: MNK DRG BRD WHM BLM SMN SCH NIN MCH AST SAM RDM

name: Wisdom of the Guardian
description: Increases defense by 1,800 and maximum HP by 10%. Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities. Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

name: Wisdom of the Ordained
description: Increases maximum MP by 50% and healing magic potency by 25%. Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities. Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

name: Wisdom of the Skirmisher
description: Increases damage dealt by 12%. Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities. Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.
jobs: MNK DRG BRD BLM SMN NIN MCH SAM RDM

name: Wisdom of the Watcher
description: Increases evasion by 25% while reducing damage dealt by 5%. Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities. Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

name: Wisdom of the Templar
description: Increases healing magic potency by 50% and maximum HP by 30%, while reducing damage dealt by 5%. Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities. Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

name: Wisdom of the Irregular
description: Increases damage dealt by 21% while reducing magic defense by 60%. Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities. Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.
jobs: MNK DRG BRD BLM SMN NIN MCH SAM RDM

name: Wisdom of the Breathtaker
description: Increases poison resistance and movement speed, including mount speed, and increases evasion by 10%. Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities. Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

name: Wisdom of the Remembered
description: Increases maximum HP by 10% and accuracy by 30%. Additional Effect: Grants a 70% chance of automatic revival upon KO Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities. Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

name: Protect L
description: Increases the physical defense of target by 1,000. Duration: 30m

name: Shell L
description: Increases the magic defense of target by 1,000. Duration: 30m

name: Death L
description: KOs target. The less the target's HP, the greater the chance of success.

name: Focus L
description: Grants a stack of Boost, up to a maximum of 16. Boost Bonus: Increases potency of next weaponskill by 30% per stack Duration: 30s Shares a recast timer with all weaponskills.

name: Paralyze L
description: Afflicts target with Paralysis Duration: 60s

name: Paralyze L III
description: Afflicts target and all neaby enemies with Paralysis Duration: 60s

name: Swift L
description: Greatly increases movement speed. Duration: 10s

name: Featherfoot L
description: Increases evasion by 15%. Duration: 45s

name: Spirit Dart L
description: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 100. Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Spirit Dart L, increasing damage taken by 8% Duration: 60s
jobs: MNK DRG BRD BLM SMN NIN MCH SAM RDM

name: Catastrophe L
description: Deals unaspected damage to all nearby enemies with a potency of 4,000, while dealing damage with a potency of 999,999 to self.
jobs: PLD MNK WAR DRG BRD NIN MCH DRK SAM

name: Dispel L
description: Removes one beneficial status from target.
jobs: MNK DRG BRD WHM BLM SMN SCH NIN MCH AST SAM RDM

name: Feint L
description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100. Additional Effect: Reduces target's evasion Duration: 60s
jobs: PLD WAR WHM SCH DRK AST

name: Stealth L
description: Blend in with your surroundings, making it impossible for most enemies to detect you, but reducing movement speed by 50%. Has no effect on certain enemies with special sight. Cannot be executed while in combat. Effect ends upon use of any action other than Sprint, or upon reuse.
jobs: PLD MNK WAR DRG BRD WHM BLM SMN SCH MCH DRK AST SAM RDM

name: Aetherial Manipulation L
description: Rush to a target's side. Unable to cast if bound.

name: Backstep L
description: Jump 10 yalms back from current position. Cannot be executed while bound.

name: Tranquilizer L
description: Stuns target. Duration: 8s

name: Bloodbath L
description: Converts a portion of damage dealt into HP. Duration: 45s

name: Rejuvenate L
description: Instantly restores 500 TP and 50% of maximum MP.

name: Haymaker L
description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300. Can only be executed immediately after evading an attack. Additional Effect: Slow +20% Duration: 30s

name: Rapid Recast L
description: Shortens recast time for next ability used by 50%. Duration: 15s

description: Restores target's HP. Cure Potency: 12,000

name: Cure L III
description: Restores HP of target and all party members nearby target. Cure Potency: 9,000
jobs: PLD MNK WAR DRG BRD BLM SMN NIN MCH DRK SAM RDM

name: Regen L

name: Eagle Eye Shot L
description: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 80. Potency increases up to 1,000% the lower the target's HP. Generates significant enmity upon use.
